Title: World Teachers’ Day: Oyo Senator congratulates Nigerian teachers
Summary: Senator Sharafadeen Alli has felicitated teachers across Nigeria on the occasion of the 2025 World Teachers’ Day . Oyo South senatorial district in the National Assembly . Alli described teachers as nation-builders and torchbearers of knowledge .

Title: Zamfara reports 179 deaths in 12,052 cholera cases
Summary: About 179 people have died out of the 12,052 cholera cases recorded in Zamfara State, representing a 1.4 per cent fatality rate . This is lower than the national average of 3.3 per cent .

Title: Court strikes out Funtua’s suit against 9mobile
Summary: Court strikes out Funtua’s suit against 9mobile . Businessman alleged 43 million shares were transferred without his consent . Justice Mohammed Umar of the Federal High Court, Abuja, struck out the suit .

Title: Court of Appeal overturns suspension of NURTW in Oyo
Summary: The Court of Appeal sitting in Ibadan, Oyo State, has overturned the suspension of the National Union of Road Transport Workers (NURTW) by the state government . In a unanimous judgment delivered by the court, it declared the action unlawful and without justification .

Title: Teachers foundation of all professions — Abiodun
Summary: Ogun State Governor, Prince Dapo Abiodun, has described teachers as the foundation of all other professions . The governor made this known during the 2025 World Teachers’ Day .

Title: Queues return as petrol stations run out of stock in Abuja
Summary: Queues return as petrol stations run out of stock in Abuja . Most outlets shut due to a shortage of products . The 650,000 barrels-per-day Dangote refinery began supplying petrol in 2024 .

Title: Gov AbdulRazaq scraps payment of PTA levy in Kwara primary schools
Summary: Gov AbdulRazaq scraps payment of payment of PTA levy in Kwara primary schools . Kwara Government has scrapped payment of Parents Teachers Association levy in public primary schools, approving annual school grants instead .

Title: NUJ commends DSS for ordering release of detained journalists
Summary: Marcus and Jang were arrested after posting a video on social media showing a confrontation between a cleric and security operatives . Marcus posted a video of the confrontation . The NUJ commends DSS for ordering release of detained journalists .

Title: Trump administration declares US cities war zones
Summary: The Trump administration branded Chicago a "war zone" Sunday as a justification for deploying soldiers against the will of local Democratic officials . A judge blocked the White House from sending troops to another Democratic-run city .

Title: Big Brother announces ₦80m prize money for season 10 finale
Summary: Big Brother has officially announced ₦80 million as the prize money for the winner of Big Brother Naija Season 10 . The winner of the show will be announced in a live-only episode .
